attributes.action: Request enquiry into stranglehold pharmaceutical cos have on health research
attributes.additional_details: I have worked as a healer for over 25 years I have over 1,000 videos that show the efficacy of healing.
attributes.background: There may be better ways than the pharmaceutical companies espouse. We need to study a wider range of treatments / therapies to provide the best and most cost effective health care.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
